name: Binary Converter
description: Converts text to binary and binary to text. Also supports binary to decimal and decimal to binary.

name: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
description: Encodes and decodes text using base64.

name: Unit Converter
description: Converts between different units of measurement. Such as length, weight, volume, area, temperature, and more.

name: Password Generator
description: Generates a random password based on user input.

name: HTML Formatter & Previewer
description: Prettifies HTML and shows a preview.

name: URL Encoder/Decoder (NYI)
description: Encodes and decodes URLs. Such as images to base64.

name: General Pretty Printer & Minifier
description: Prettifies and minifies file formats such as XML, CSS, JavaScript, and more.

name: Image Tools
description: Tools for working with images. Such as resizing, cropping, and converting, color picker, rotating, and more.

name: Simple Notepad (NYI)
description: A simple notepad for taking notes.

name: Compress & Decompress Text
description: Compresses and decompresses text and text from files using Lz-String.

name: Text Tools
description: Tools for working with text. Such as Character Counter, Word Counter, Macro Applier, Text Comparer and more.

name: Scientific Calculator
description: An all around use calculator. Supports basic and advanced calculations.
